text: So I just wanted to point out that it's Thursday and still no AndroidChat weekly
I want to have it auto generated, but that needs a bit of effort :smile:
I have an idea tho so that counts :smile:
> but that needs a bit of effort
In the mean time, I’ll put issue 3 together

text: Figured that way it's easier than going back and forth :simple_smile: Sadly GitHub only sometimes detects a manual merge. Probably cause I amended your commit instead of making a new one with my changes

attachments.fallback: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] Issue created: '#18 Make the "Join" section more visible' https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/18 by langerhans
attachments.text:
I just realized that the section where you can join now gets pushed out of the initial view of the page. This will probably not help with new sign ups and won'#t get better over time with more articles coming in.

We should think about making the Join section more visible. Suggestions for a design are welcome.
attachments.title: #18 Make the "Join" section more visible

attachments.fallback: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] Issue created: '#19 The background image has nothing to do with the page content' https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/19 by langerhans
attachments.text:
How about we try and find some header image that adds a bit more context to what the page is about? It bothers me that a key visual is just a "pretty" picture but gives you literally no idea if we a re a Slack community about Android or one about foggy forests roads. 

Suggestions welcome :)
attachments.title: #19 The background image has nothing to do with the page content

attachments.fallback: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/19#issuecomment-198061134|#19: The background image has nothing to do with the page content>
attachments.text: See the contributing instructions. People can upload their own and reference it in their blog posts. The latest header image will be used and if there is a default fallback.
attachments.pretext: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/19#issuecomment-198061134|#19: The background image has nothing to do with the page content>
attachments.title: Comment by AndreasBackx

attachments.fallback: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/18#issuecomment-198061675|#18: Make the "Join" section more visible>
attachments.text: At first it was at the top of the page, but people wanted it at the bottom. If there's any way you can make it more prominent without intervening with the blog posts stuff that much, go ahead.
attachments.pretext: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/18#issuecomment-198061675|#18: Make the "Join" section more visible>
attachments.title: Comment by AndreasBackx

attachments.fallback: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/19#issuecomment-198083478|#19: The background image has nothing to do with the page content>
attachments.text: That's great and all, but given most of the time we'll see the weekly posts up there, we should update the default image.
attachments.pretext: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/19#issuecomment-198083478|#19: The background image has nothing to do with the page content>
attachments.title: Comment by langerhans

attachments.fallback: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/18#issuecomment-198084033|#18: Make the "Join" section more visible>
attachments.text: Didn't say we have to move the whole section, but a prominent button or link that scrolls down would be nice I guess. I'm no designer, I'm writing this from a visitor perspective.
attachments.pretext: [androidchat/androidchat.github.io] New comment on issue <https://github.com/androidchat/androidchat.github.io/issues/18#issuecomment-198084033|#18: Make the "Join" section more visible>
attachments.title: Comment by langerhans
